attributes.action: Residents of Selly Oak in Birmingham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The academic year hasn’t started yet but it looks like the current student populous fails to have regard for the few permanent residents in Rookery Road. Respect and consideration seems to have been ignored even though the university’s own handbook states that fact.

Being one of the youngest residents at 60 years of age I feel it’s my duty to those at 70+ to bring this to your attention. Those residents in the higher age bracket are from a generation who were taught to grin and bear it – but why should they?

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
